item.title: By: Heather
item.dc:creator: Heather
item.description:
<blockquote>Well, another ten levels of content, that's non-raider.</blockquote>
Lol. Most games these days give out 10 levels of content for free while Blizz tends to charge the price of nearly a full game for their expansions. I can get through 10 levels of content pretty quickly, and I'm not a hard-core gamer. I can't imagine paying full box price if that's the majority of what there is in the expansion for me to make use of. And while I'm sure new dances and hairstyles are nice and all, that's maybe five to ten minutes of entertainment right there. I have a limited budget---if it's going to come down to paying for another 10 levels of the same kinds of quests and monsters, or something new and different like Pirates of the Burning Sea, I know where my money's going.

item.description: Lol! Too, too funny. I'm about *this close* to cancelling my sub. *sigh* But I probably won't, since one of the main folks I used to play WoW with is returning from Afghanistan at the end of the month. Sure, the new expansion sounds kinda interesting, but worth the full price if you aren't a raider? I'm thinking... no.
